item.title: Getting Back to the CLI
item.description:
Getting Back to the CLI…

It’s been a long time since my job required direct interaction with the machine. Now that I’ve started back at ground zero .. I’m back to where I feel most comfortable. The green glow of the CLI.

My goal for the next year+ is to make github commits everyday. :-)

item.title: second post
item.description: This is my first hugo website.. it has many nice static website things going on.

item.title: first post
item.description: Hey, let’s get this blog started. Today i decided i would commit to blogging on my recent tech journey.
